拺字的基本解释

拺
cè
古同“策”，（竹制的）马鞭。
扶持。

拺
sè
择取。

拺
chuò
　ㄔㄨㄛˋ
古同“擉”，刺；戳。

拺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cè］
［《廣韻》楚革切，入麥，初。］
(1)马鞭。
(2)同“”。
[②]［sè］
［《廣韻》山責切，入麥，生。］
择。
[③]［chuò］
［《集韻》測角切，入覺，初。］
同“擉1”。
刺；戳。

拺字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　拺； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页428第20
【唐韻】山責切【集韻】色責切，?音摵。讀與瑟近。【佩觿集】擇取物也。　又【唐韻】楚革切【集韻】測革切，?音策。扶也。與㩍同。　又【集韻】測角切，音齪。刺取也。與擉同。

拺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
拺字的起名意思

暂无。

Ming
Basic explanation of words
Ming
cè
Ancient Tong "Ce", (bamboo) riding whip.
Support.
Ming
sè
Choose to take.
Ming
chuò
ㄔ ㄨ ㄛˋ
Gu Tong "fan", stab; poke.
Ming
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cè］
["Guangyun" Chu Geqi, into wheat, early. ]
(1) Horse whip.
(2) Same as "".
[②]［sè］
["Guangyun" Mountain blames cuts, enters wheat, and gives birth. ]
select.
[③] [chuò]
["Jiyun" angle measurement cut, enter the sense, the beginning. ]
Same as "擉1".
Thorn; poke.
Ming
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Mao Collection】【Hand Character Department】　拺; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: page 428 to 20
[Tang Yun] Mountain Responsibility to Cut [Jiyun] Color Responsibility to Cut,? Sound. Read and feel close. 【Peiyou Collection】Choose things.　[Tang Yun] Chu Geqie [Jiyun] Test Geqie,? Yince. Fu also. Same as 㩍.　[Jiyun] Angle measurement and cut, the sound is dirty. Stabbing also. Same as Huan.
